attributes.additional_details: Qatar has an unacceptable record on human rights, womens rights and to send an English Football team there would be to accept this barbaric regime. Sporting boycotts work, sporting boycotts matter. Lets show we have morals that outweigh financial gain, for the good of our daughters.
attributes.background: Instruct the FA to boycott the 2022 FIFA world cup.

rejection.details: It is up to the Football Association, not the Government or House of Commons, whether to take part in the 2020 World Cup.
